trans-unit.source: Provides a general-purpose attribute that lets you specify localizable strings for types and members of entity partial classes.
The properties of this class can be used either as literals or as resource identifiers for a specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType%2A> instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute"></xref> class.

The constructor initializes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt%2A> properties to an empty string.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether UI should be generated automatically in order to display this field.
Do not use this property to access the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.AutoGenerateField%2A> property.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GetAutoGenerateField%2A> method instead.
`true` if UI should be generated automatically to display this field; otherwise, `false`.
An attempt was made to get the property value before it was set.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering UI is automatically displayed for this field.
Do not use this property to get the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.AutoGenerateFilter%2A> property.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GetAutoGenerateFilter%2A> method instead.
Setting this property overrides the default behavior for specifying which columns are included as filters.
`true` if UI should be generated automatically to display filtering for this field; otherwise, `false`.
An attempt was made to get the property value before it was set.
Gets or sets a value that is used to display a description in the UI.
Do not use this property to get the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description%2A> property.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GetDescription%2A> method instead.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description%2A> property is typically used as a tooltip or description UI element that is bound to the member using this attribute.
The Dynamic Data Edit.ascx template will display the description as a tooltip in text-entry fields.
A `null` value or empty string is valid.
The value that is used to display a description in the UI.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.AutoGenerateField"></xref> property.
The value of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.AutoGenerateField"></xref> if the property has been initialized; otherwise, `null`.
Returns a value that indicates whether UI should be generated automatically in order to display filtering for this field.
The value of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.AutoGenerateFilter"></xref> if the property has been initialized; otherwise, `null`.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description"></xref> property.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description%2A> property is typically used as a tooltip for the property that is annotated with this attribute.

The localized description, if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> has been specified and the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description"></xref> property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description"></xref> property.

The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property and the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description"></xref> property are initialized, but a public static property that has a name that matches the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description"></xref> value could not be found for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GroupName"></xref> property.
A value that will be used for grouping fields in the UI, if <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GroupName"></xref> has been initialized; otherwise, `null`.

If the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property has been specified and the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GroupName"></xref> property represents a resource key, a localized string is returned; otherwise, a non-localized string is returned.
Returns a value that is used for field display in the UI.
The name is typically used as the field label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name%2A> property.
A `null` value or empty string is valid.

The localized string for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name"></xref> property, if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property has been specified and the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name"></xref> property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name"></xref> property.

The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property and the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name"></xref> property are initialized, but a public static property that has a name that matches the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name"></xref> value could not be found for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Order"></xref> property.
If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider setting the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Order%2A> property to 10000.
This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order.
The value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Order"></xref> property, if it has been set; otherwise, `null`.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt"></xref> property.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt%2A> property is typically used as a prompt or watermark for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt%2A> attribute.

Gets the localized string for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt"></xref> property if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property has been specified and if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt"></xref> property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt"></xref> property.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName"></xref> property.
The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute.
This property returns either the literal, non-localized string, or a localized string if <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType%2A> is not `null`.

The localized string for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName"></xref> property if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType"></xref> property has been specified and if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName"></xref> property represents a resource key; otherwise, the non-localized value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName"></xref> value property.
Gets or sets a value that is used to group fields in the UI.
Do not use this property to get the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GroupName%2A> property.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GetDescription%2A> method instead.
A `null` value or empty string is valid.
A value that is used to group fields in the UI.
Gets or sets a value that is used for display in the UI.
Do not use this property to get the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name%2A> property.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GetName%2A> method instead.
The name is typically used as the field label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute.
The Dynamic Data List.aspx, ListDetails.aspx, and Details.aspx page templates use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name%2A> property for the field label.
A `null` value or empty string is valid.
A value that is used for display in the UI.
Gets or sets the order weight of the column.
Columns are sorted in increasing order based on the order value.
Columns without this attribute have an order value of 0.
Negative values are valid and can be used to position a column before all non-negative columns.
If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider using the value 10000.
This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order.
The order weight of the column.
Gets or sets a value that will be used to set the watermark for prompts in the UI.
This property is typically used as a prompt or watermark for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute.
Do not use this method to access the prompt string.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.GetPrompt%2A> method instead.
A value that will be used to display a watermark in the UI.

Gets or sets the type that contains the resources for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description"></xref> properties.

If this value is `null`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description%2A> properties are assumed to be literal, non-localized strings.
If this value is not `null`, the string properties are assumed to be the names of public static properties that return the actual string value.

The type of the resource that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Name"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Prompt"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.Description"></xref> properties.
Gets or sets a value that is used for the grid column label.
The short name is used as the grid column label for a UI element that is bound to the property that is annotated with this attribute.
The Dynamic Data Insert.aspx and Edit.aspx page templates use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName%2A> for the field label.

This property returns the localized string for <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType%2A> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property has been specified and if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName%2A> property represents a resource key.

If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property has not been specified or if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute.ShortName%2A> property is not a resource key, this property returns a non-localized string.
A value that is for the grid column label.
